categoriesExplanation:
The primary focus of this video is on the practice of breathing exercises, specifically described in both the title ("Breathing Exercise | Slowest Breathing Pace | 2 Minute Breath-Hold | Pranayama") and throughout the description, which outlines a structured breathing routine involving deep breaths and breath-holds. This aligns strongly with the 'Breathing exercises' category, and thus it is assigned a score of 1.0 due to the explicit and comprehensive emphasis.

Additionally, the channel’s content and description suggest an emphasis on meditation practices ("Hands-On Meditation" channel title, description content), which implies that meditation may be practiced in tandem with the breathing exercises. The comments and user experiences ("felt much calmer", "pure relaxation") further support the presence of 'Meditation' as a component of this video. Hence, a score of 0.7 is given to 'Meditation' for its collaborative presence in the video's impact and method.
